mapper.insert: insert into MAKER (MAKER_ID, MAKER_NO, MAKER_NAME, MAKER_PASSWORD, ADDRESS, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER) values (MAKERID.nextval,#{makerNO},#{makerName},#{makerPassword},#{address},#{email},#{phoneNumber})
mapper.update: update MAKER set MAKER_NO = #{makerNO}, MAKER_NAME = #{makerName}, MAKER_PASSWORD = #{makerPassword}, ADDRESS = #{address}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber}, where #{MAKERID}=MAKER_ID
